metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5685 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The lazy_bdecode function in BitTorrent DHT bootstrap server (bootstrap-dht) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet,related to "improper indexing."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtorrent-rasterbar9 - 1.1.5-1build1
python-libtorrent - 1.1.5-1build1
python3-libtorrent - 1.1.5-1build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libtorrent-rasterbar package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.5-1build1').
